title: Advice to a Prophet - in line 13, the speaker is

content.prompt: In line 13 (“Speak of the world’s own change”), the speaker is doing which of the following?

choices.label: Exchanging his own point of view for that of the prophet

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
